core

Class Constants

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.Constants

  • public class Constants
extends java.lang.Object
    Constants variables used along the application.
    Author:
    Moises Baly

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DIVE_HORIZONTAL_DISPLACEMENT_FACTOR
      Division factor when trying different positions to drop the piece along the X axes.
      static int DX_SWEEP_FACTOR
      Division factor for the displacement of pieces when trying to Increasing this factor will produce smaller horizontal steps.
      static int DY_SWEEP_FACTOR
      Division factor for the displacement of pieces when trying to place pieces inside others in the maximal rectangles optimization step.
      static int[] ROTATION_ANGLES
      This is the vector of angles for which we will try to drop a piece in the simulation algorithm.

    • Field Detail

      • DIVE_HORIZONTAL_DISPLACEMENT_FACTOR

        public static final int DIVE_HORIZONTAL_DISPLACEMENT_FACTOR
        Division factor when trying different positions to drop the piece along the X axes. Increasing this factor will produce smaller horizontal steps.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DX_SWEEP_FACTOR

        public static final int DX_SWEEP_FACTOR
        Division factor for the displacement of pieces when trying to Increasing this factor will produce smaller horizontal steps.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DY_SWEEP_FACTOR

        public static final int DY_SWEEP_FACTOR
        Division factor for the displacement of pieces when trying to place pieces inside others in the maximal rectangles optimization step. Increasing this factor will produce smaller vertical steps.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ROTATION_ANGLES

        public static final int[] ROTATION_ANGLES
        This is the vector of angles for which we will try to drop a piece in the simulation algorithm. Adding angles to the vector will result in that we will try them until a valid position is found or until all options are exhausted.

        public Constants()
